hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -o pipefail
DPL_WORKSPACE=/var/lib/jenkins/jobs/DPL/workspace
# env setup for dmd/phobos export DMD=${DPL_WORKSPACE}/dmd/src/dmd export DC=${DMD} export PATH="$(dirname ${DMD}):$PATH" export LIBRARY_PATH="${DPL_WORKSPACE}/phobos/generated/linux/release/64/:$LIBRARY_PATH" export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="${DPL_WORKSPACE}/phobos/generated/linux/release/64/:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH"
if [ -d .git ]; then git fetch else git clone --recursive git://github.com/$REPO.git . fi LATEST=$(git tag -l | egrep '^v[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$$' | sort --version-sort | tail -n 1) git reset --hard git clean -dxf >/dev/null git checkout $LATEST
case $REPO in # makefile projects w/o .travis.yml Hackerpilot/DCD|Hackerpilot/dfix) make DMD=${DMD} ;; gtkd-developers/GtkD) make test DC=${DC} ;; # can't use DMD/DC from env yet higgsjs/Higgs) make -C source test DC=${DC} ;; # matrix build for vibe.d rejectedsoftware/vibe.d) # use DC=dmd to workaround https://github.com/dlang/dub/pull/966 DC=dmd VIBED_DRIVER=libevent BUILD_EXAMPLE=1 RUN_TEST=1 ./travis-ci.sh DC=dmd VIBED_DRIVER=libasync BUILD_EXAMPLE=0 RUN_TEST=0 ./travis-ci.sh ;; dlang/dub) rm test/issue884-init-defer-file-creation.sh # FIXME DC=dmd ./travis-ci.sh ;; BlackEdder/ggplotd) # workaround https://github.com/BlackEdder/ggplotd/issues/34 sed -i 's|auto seed = unpredictableSeed|auto seed = 54321|' source/ggplotd/example.d ;& # fall-through # .travis.yml *) if [ -f .travis.yml ]; then shyaml get-values script < .travis.yml 2>/dev/null || \ shyaml get-value script 'dub test --compiler=$DC' < .travis.yml \ | bash -sexo pipefail else dub test --compiler=$DC fi ;; esac
